meanings.definition: Using or involving physical violence or emotional cruelty
meanings.sent1: The abusive behavior towards the animal was very cruel.
meanings.sent2: She left the relationship because of his abusive actions.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave an abusive look when it didn't get its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: The storm's abusive winds shook the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The abusive words left a lasting impact on her self-esteem.

meanings.definition: Characterized by improper or wrongful use or treatment

meanings.sent2: The company faced consequences for their abusive business practices.
meanings.sent3: The toaster had an abusive relationship with the power outlet.
meanings.sent4: The abusive use of resources caused environmental damage.
meanings.sent5: The abusive treatment of the painting resulted in irreversible damage.
